page.title: 03APPLEBY MAGNA VILLAGE
page.content: Our village is called{Appleby Magna. We did a survey of the families at our school and we found that nearly twice as many people work out of the village as they do in the village.The village has{two shops}one is a small food shop and the other is a post office and a food shop.We have two pubs,one called the{'Black Horse'}and the other is called the{'Crown'.}We have four phone boxes in and around the village. In Appleby there are{two butchers.}Also we have{three coal merchants}but the neighbouring larger village of Measham hasn't got any.Near Bowleys lane is a large open space called the recreation ground on which people can play games. In addition to the farms there are { {two transport firms.}The largest, Fowkes & Son, carry mainly bricks. The{population}of Appleby Magna is {1040}adults and children.
